ca.diro.UserHandlingUtils.Actions

Interface IAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddEventAction, CancelEventAction, CloseSessionAction, CommentEventAction, CreateUserAccountAction, ModifyAccountAction, OpenSessionAction, UnauthorizedAction, UserAction

    public interface IAction
    The interface for user actions. Every action type that can be performed by a user that requires a permission should implement this interface.
    Author:
    lavoiedn

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCallerID()
      Returns the user ID of the user who initiated this IAction.
      UserPermissions getRequiredUserPermissions()
      Returns the UserPermissions required to perform this action.
      int getTargetID()
      Returns the ID of the target of this IAction.
      ResultSet performAuthorizedAction(String request)
      Applies the IAction's effects.

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetID

        int getTargetID()
        Returns the ID of the target of this IAction.
        Returns:
        The ID of the target of this IAction.

      • getCallerID

        int getCallerID()
        Returns the user ID of the user who initiated this IAction.
        Returns:
        The user ID of the user who initiated this IAction.

      • getRequiredUserPermissions

        UserPermissions getRequiredUserPermissions()
        Returns the UserPermissions required to perform this action.
        Returns:
        The UserPermissions required to perform this action.

      • performAuthorizedAction

        ResultSet performAuthorizedAction(String request)
                                  throws ActionPermissionsException
        Applies the IAction's effects. Note that permission handling must be done before the IAction is performed.
        Parameters:
        request - The String containing the required information for this IAction.
        Returns:
        The ResultSet resulting from the execution of the given request.
        Throws:
        ActionPermissionsException
